summary: It\'s always bugged me that you already know two spells when you\'re journey in Skyrim begins. Now you begin completely from scratch!
descriptionHtml:
It has always bugged me that you already know the two spells, Healing and Flames, when you\'re journey in Skyrim begins, I don\'t like that the game is making these decisions for me if I don\'t want to be a sorcerer. Now you begin completely from scratch! The two spells you normally start with are now hidden somewhere in Helgen Keep, and if you can\'t find them I\'ve added them to the general goods trader in Riverwood and you can buy them there if you can\'t find them.

iNSTALLATION:
Use NMM or add it in the Skyrim/Data directory and activate it with the Skyrim Launcher/data files.

Remember to endorse if you like it!
author: Craxmerax
